      public JSONMap​(Map<?,​?> map)

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getBy

      public Object getBy​(String attributePath)
      Returns an object deep from the structure of a JSON document. 
           {
         "university": {
             students : {
                 "mary" : {
                           "first_name": "Mary",
                           "last_name": "Smith",
                  },
                 "joe" : {
                     "first_name": "Joe",
                     "last_name": "Shmoe",
                 }
             }
         }
     }
      Parameters:
      attributePath - accepts a dot-delimited format: "university.students.joe" where every entry except the last one must be a map
      Returns:
      an object from the depths of the JSON structure.

    • containsKeyBy

      public boolean containsKeyBy​(String attributePath)
      Returns true if object exists.
      Parameters:
      attributePath - accepts a dot-delimited format: "university.students.joe" where every entry except the last one must be a map
      Returns:
      true if exists

    • putBy

      public Object putBy​(String attributePath, Object value)
      Put the object deep into the structure of the JSON document.
      Parameters:
      attributePath - accepts a dot-delimited format: "university.students.joe" where every entry except the last one must be a map
      value - value
      Returns:
      previous value

    • putBy

      public Object putBy​(String attributePath, Object value, boolean create)
      Put an object deep to the structure of a JSON document.
      Parameters:
      attributePath - accepts a dot-delimited format: "university.students.joe" where every entry except the last one must be a map
      value - value
      create - create intermediate objects if true
      Returns:
      previous value

    • getMap

      public JSONMap getMap​(String attributePath)
      Returns a map deep from the structure of a JSON document. 
           {
         "university": {
             students : {
                 "mary" : {
                           "first_name": "Mary",
                           "last_name": "Smith",
                  },
                 "joe" : {
                     "first_name": "Joe",
                     "last_name": "Shmoe",
                 }
             }
         }
     }
      Parameters:
      attributePath - accepts a dot-delimited format: "university.students.joe" where every entry must be a map
      Returns:
      a map from the depths of the JSON structure.

    • getList

      public JSONList getList​(String attributePath)
      Returns a list deep from the structure of JSON document. 
           {
         "university": {
             students : ["mary", joe]

         }
     }
      Parameters:
      attributePath - accepts a dot-delimited format: "university.students" where every entry must be a map
      Returns:
      list from the depths of the JSON structure.
